newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Allied Group group shares suspend trade.
newsitem.headline: Allied Group group shares suspend trade.

text.p: Trading in shares of Allied Group Ltd, Allied Properties (H.K.) Ltd, and Allied Industries International Ltd was suspended at their own request on Wednesday pending an announcement, the Stock Exchange said. Allied Group owned 47.36 percent of Allied Properties and 50.59 percent of Allied Industries as of June 1996.
Shares of Allied Group ended unchanged at HK$0.83 a share on Tuesday, Allied Properties rose HK$0.01 to end at HK$1.20 and Allied Industries was up HK$0.13 to HK$0.99.
